description: Multi-platinum, Grammy Award-winner Marc Anthony gives a spectacular performance from The Garden. The concert features hits from his smash English-language debut album Marc Anthony, along with some of his Spanish-language classics.
keywords: tv special,reference to marc anthony,latin music,new york city,manhattan new york city
name: Marc Anthony: The Concert from Madison Square Garden

original_info.id: Marc Anthony: Concert from Madison Square Garden_2004
original_info.name: Marc Anthony: Concert from Madison Square Garden

review.name: Marc Anthony......the man behind the music.
review.reviewBody: Marc.......Singer, Songwriter, Actor, Father, and Humanitarian. He co-founded Maestro Cares Foundation, a non-profit charity for homeless and abandoned children. So far, 12 homes have been erected in various parts of the world. I am proud to volunteer and donate to this worthy cause.
